Test.Name: All Features Supported (GetServices, no PTZ node)
Test.Description: Set RecordingToken=0 in GUI Make sure that PTZNode is not presented in GUI

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
All feautes are supported
DEFINE FEATURES
STEP 1 - GetCapabilities (no credentials supplied) Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - GetServices (no credentials supplied) Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Check GetCapabiilities and GetServices GetCapabilities: SUPPORTED GetServices: SUPPORTED Use GetServices and GetServiceCapabilities for defining features STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Get Service Capabilities (no credentials supplied) Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 5 - Analyze Device Service capabilities Use GetServiceCapabilities response STEP PASSED
STEP 6 - Define Network features NTP: SUPPORTED IPv6: SUPPORTED DHCPv6: SUPPORTED Zero Configuration: SUPPORTED Dynamic DNS: SUPPORTED IP Filter: SUPPORTED STEP PASSED
STEP 7 - Define Security capabilities WS-UserName token: SUPPORTED Digest: SUPPORTED STEP PASSED
STEP 8 - Define Logging features Logging: SUPPORTED STEP PASSED
STEP 9 - Define Device IO features Device Service\IO\Relay Outputs: SUPPORTED STEP PASSED
STEP 10 - Get Relay Outputs Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 11 - Set Relay Output settings (IdleState=Monostable, Mode=closed) Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 12 - Set Relay Output settings (IdleState=Monostable, Mode=open) Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
Device Service\IO\Relay Outputs\Monostable\Closed: SUPPORTED Device Service\IO\Relay Outputs\Monostable\Open: SUPPORTED Device Service\IO\Relay Outputs\Monostable: SUPPORTED
STEP 13 - Set Relay Output settings (IdleState=Bistable, Mode=closed) Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 14 - Set Relay Output settings (IdleState=Bistable, Mode=open) Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
Device Service\IO\Relay Outputs\Bistable\Closed: SUPPORTED Device Service\IO\Relay Outputs\Bistable\Open: SUPPORTED Device Service\IO\Relay Outputs\Bistable: SUPPORTED
STEP 15 - Define Discovery features Bye message: SUPPORTED Unicast Probe request to the DUT has exceeded the allotted timeout. STEP PASSED
Events service is MANDATORY
STEP 16 - Get Event service capabilities Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
Persistent Notification Storage: NOT SUPPORTED WS Basic Notification: SUPPORTED STEP 17 - Define Media features Use GetServices response Media service: SUPPORTED MANDATORY features: Video, JPEG, RTP/UDP, RTP/RTSP/HTTP STEP PASSED
STEP 18 - Get Video Encoder Configuration Options Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
H.264: SUPPORTED MPEG4: SUPPORTED
STEP 19 - Get Audio Encoder Configuration Options Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 20 - Define Audio features Audio : SUPPORTED MANDATORY feature: G711 G726: SUPPORTED AAC: SUPPORTED STEP PASSED
STEP 21 - Get Media Capabilities Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 22 - Define Streaming features Use GetServiceCapabilities response RTP/RTSP/TCP: SUPPORTED RTPMulticast/UDP: SUPPORTED STEP PASSED
Define GetSnapshotURI capability
STEP 23 - Get Profiles Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
Find profile with Video Source and Video Encoder for testing Snapshot URI feature
Use profile with token media_profile1
STEP 24 - Get snapshot URI Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
GetSnapshotUri: SUPPORTED
STEP 25 - Get Audio Outputs Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 26 - Define Audio Output features Audio Output: SUPPORTED STEP PASSED
Check Audio Output sub-features
STEP 27 - Get Audio Decoder Configuration Options Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
AAC: SUPPORTED G711: SUPPORTED G726: SUPPORTED STEP 28 - Check IO service Use GetServices response Device IO Service: SUPPORTED STEP PASSED
STEP 29 - Get IO capabilities Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 30 - Define RelayOutputs features Use GetServiceCapabilities response Relay outputs: SUPPORTED STEP PASSED
STEP 31 - Define DigitalInputs features Use GetServiceCapabilities response Digital inputs: SUPPORTED STEP PASSED
STEP 32 - Define PTZ service Use GetServices response PTZ Service: SUPPORTED STEP PASSED
Note: no node for testing was selected. Testing will be performed for the first node in list.
STEP 33 - Get PTZ Nodes Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
Use node with token ptz0
STEP 34 - Define PTZ Features Absolute: SUPPORTED Absolute Pan/Tilt: SUPPORTED Absolute Zoom: SUPPORTED Relative: SUPPORTED Relative Pan/Tilt: SUPPORTED Relative Zoom: SUPPORTED Absolute or relative: SUPPORTED Continuous move is MANDATORY Continuous Pan/Tilt: SUPPORTED Continuous Zoom: SUPPORTED Speed: SUPPORTED Speed Pan/Tilt: SUPPORTED Speed Zoom: SUPPORTED Presets: SUPPORTED Home position: SUPPORTED Auxilliary: SUPPORTED STEP PASSED
Define Fixed/Configurable Home
STEP 35 - Get PTZ Configurations Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
1 configurations found
STEP 36 - Get Profiles Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 37 - Add PTZ configuration Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 38 - Set Home position Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 39 - Remove PTZ configuration Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
Fixed Home: NOT SUPPORTED Configurable Home: SUPPORTED
STEP 40 - Define Imaging features Use GetServices response Imaging: SUPPORTED STEP PASSED
STEP 41 - Define Analytics features Use GetServices response Analytics: SUPPORTED STEP PASSED
STEP 42 - Define Recording Control service support Recording Control service: SUPPORTED STEP PASSED
STEP 43 - Get Recording service capabilities Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
Dynamic recordings: SUPPORTED Dynamic tracks: SUPPORTED Audio Recording: SUPPORTED
STEP 44 - Define Search service support Search service: SUPPORTED STEP PASSED
STEP 45 - Get Search service capabilities Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
Metadata Search: SUPPORTED

Metadata Recording: SUPPORTED

PTZPositionSearch: SUPPORTED
STEP 48 - EndSearch Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED

Reverse Replay: SUPPORTED

STEP 53 - Define Receiver service support Receiver service: SUPPORTED STEP 54 - Define AccessControl service support Access Control service: SUPPORTED STEP PASSED
STEP 55 - Get AreaInfo list Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
Area Entity: SUPPORTED MANDATORY feature: AccessPoint Entity
STEP 56 - Get AccessPointInfo list Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
Enable/Disable AccessPoint: SUPPORTED Duress: SUPPORTED AccessTaken: SUPPORTED External Authorization: SUPPORTED Anonymous Access: SUPPORTED

MANDATORY feature: Door Entity
STEP 58 - Get DoorInfo list Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
Access Door: SUPPORTED Lock Door: SUPPORTED Unlock Door: SUPPORTED Double Lock Door: SUPPORTED Block Door: SUPPORTED Lock Down Door: SUPPORTED Lock Open Door: SUPPORTED Door Monitor: SUPPORTED Lock Monitor: SUPPORTED Double Lock Monitor: SUPPORTED Door/Alarm: SUPPORTED Door/Tamper: SUPPORTED Door/Fault: SUPPORTED
